column4: <thomas_> my sound keyboard shortcuts put down the false channel on my soundcard anyone know how to solve this ? <== I have the exact same issue and do not know how to resolve this.
thats a little bit hard because i don't know what scripts are responsible for putting down sound
a solution would be very good
yes, unfortunately, I haven't been able to find one.
do you also get shown two soundcards in the gnome volume manager ?
no. I can't see what the command that the keyshortcut is calling :-(
would be a great progess if we would know what script is called
yeah, I just can't find it though.
i will look through the source code of gnome volume manager
I tried that, but it's a binary.
hmmm that will be hard in a way
maybe come to #alsa and watch join my conversation with a other guy
I'm in #alsa now but nobody is talking!
i think he is searching for a solution
did you manage to get the volume problem sorted?
